Key Match Events: Zack Wheeler pitched a perfect game with 20 strikeouts
Edmundo Sosa hit a solo home run in the third inning
Trea Turner hit a solo home run in the sixth inning
Weston Wilson scored a run in the seventh inning
Michael Harris II made a spectacular catch to rob Austin Hays of a home run
Post-Match Reflections: Zack Wheeler said it was special to achieve his 100th career victory
Philadelphia Phillies' manager Rob Thomson praised Wheeler's performance
Atlanta Braves' manager Brian Snitker complimented Michael Harris II's catch
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in front of a sellout crowd of 42,730
